name: madDDoctor
description:
maDDocor was created for the LowRez Game Jam 2019 under the 64x64-pixel constraint.

Creators:

Graphics: Nielisson

Code: @Rensei_ TheRensei

Audio: @_AdamFrost

***

Version sumbitted for the gamejam can be played in a browser or You can download it down at the bottom of the page. ***

***

This is the most important day for the clinic. Your job is to cure all patients. The institute cannot afford ny mistakes. You have to do this to save the Clinic from shutting down!

Look at the diagnosis Screen to diagnose the monsters illness and unlock new information available in Patients Record. When new information is available this button will blink.

You can pet a monster by clicking on him. Pets just make them feel better :3

In the Patient Record you can find current Health, Name of the patient, and Disease Details.


After you gather enough information you can open Medicine Lab to create a remedy to cure your patients. Choose one element and one herb and combine them together to create a Medicine!

Note that you can get some details about herbs and elements by clicking on them.

After creating a medicine click Apply button to administer the medicine.

You can win only by curing all patients.
